name: quotient
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a particular degree or amount of something: This is a car with a high head-turning quotient (= a lot of people turn to look at it).
mathematics
  specialized the result of dividing one number by another

Add to word list
Add to word list
the degree, rate, or amount of something: King had a full quotient of faults.
mathematics A quotient is also the result you get when you divide one number by another.
